row.process:
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.ECHO_ON_OFF :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH
!-------------------------------------Logging input parameters------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION !Logging input parameters :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "HPQC Host URL" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_HPQC_BASE_URL#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "HPQC User Name" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_HPQC_USERNAME#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Password" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_HPQC_PASSWORD#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
!------------------------------------------ Buidling java arguments -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Action name :SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ACTION_NAME# = "LOGIN" ! Define java options and values :DEFINE &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#, string, 6
: SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[1] = "-action" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_HPQC_ACTION_NAME#" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[2] = "&UC4RB_HPQC_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[3] = "-baseurl" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_HPQC_BASE_URL#" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[4] = "&UC4RB_HPQC_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[5] = "-username" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_HPQC_USERNAME#" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[6] = "&UC4RB_HPQC_OPTION_VALUE#"
! Access key is decrypted and send to jar as argument :SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = "&UC4RB_HPQC_PASSWORD#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PRV.INCLUDE.BUILD_JAVA_ARGUMENTS
! Setting execution environment : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.SET_EXEC_ENVIRONMENT : PRINT &UC4RB_HPQC_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#
!Invoking java binary :SWITCH &$PLATFORM# :CASE "WINDOWS" java -jar &UC4RB_HPQC_PATH_JAR# &UC4RB_HPQC_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# -password "%UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD%" :CASE "UNIX" java -jar &UC4RB_HPQC_PATH_JAR# &UC4RB_HPQC_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# -password "$UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD" :OTHER :ENDSWITCH
! Status messages :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** LOGIN ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** LOGIN ACTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Printing messages as per Error code and exit accordingly. : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS
